name: Bean go space
description:
Have you ever wanted to go to space, collect milk, and fly a rocket trough tight places? No? Well me neither. But if you want, now's the chance. In this very quality game, you will become a BEAN astronaut, who has been teleported to space by his evil twin brother, known as, Bob. Your objective is to fly your space rocket, with perfect physics,, trough thight spaces into the finish and collect milk along the way, The game is intended to be not taken seriously and is my first game.

NB!  This game is really infuriating and by deffinition, is a rage game. The game creator isn't responsible for any broken keyboards, laptops, headsets, mice or monitors. If you would like to file a complaint and sue me...don't.
